text: Namba 50ɨn azenimɨn ia datɨrɨghɨn sɨghabagh iviamin dughiamɨn ikegh mangɨ azenir vamɨran tugham, ia a damutɨ, a nan azenimra ikɨ. Eghtɨ ia gumazamizibav mɨkɨm suam, me azenir kamɨn fɨrighɨreghtɨ men osɨmtɨziba gɨvaghtɨ me deraghvɨra ikiam. Azenir kamɨn, gumazir gumazir igharazibar nguazibagh ivezeziba, me vaghvagh ua nguazir kaba isɨ dar guizɨn ghuavibar anɨngigh, o men adarazir anɨngigh. Eghtɨ ingangarir gumazamizir kɨniba, me vaghvagh ingangarir kam ategh, ua uan adarazi baghvɨra mangɨ.
